text: Cut the cherry tomatoes in half.  Combine the red onion, shredded basil and red wine vinegar in a bowl. Add the halved cherry tomatoes. Allow to marinate. Toast the bread slices. Once toasted, rub each slice with the open side of the cut garlic halves. This will impart the flavour of garlic without having to include it as a direct, raw ingredient. Arrange each slice on a small white serving plate. If preferred, use a larger white serving plate and place two or more slices per plate - it is really up to your menu needs. Use a tablespoon to place heaped spoonfuls of the tomato mixture onto each slice.  Drizzle a little olive oil over each heaped tomato mixture. A few dots on each place here and there do not matter. Clean up any loose tomato mixture if needed, or you may prefer to leave it looking more rustic. Top with salt and pepper to taste. Alternatively, leave the seasoning to the discretion of the guests. Finished.
